name: Block Puzzle (itch) (Mini Apps and Games)
description:
Block puzzle game is an easy to play but challenging puzzle game. Try it and you will love this block puzzle game.

Features of the block puzzle:

- No wifi needed

- No time limits

- Totally free block puzzle classic

- You can play anytime and anywhere! We really hope you enjoy it!

How to play block puzzle:

- Place the blocks into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new blocks.

- Blocks can't be rotated.

- Game will be over if there is no room for more blocks.
